metadata.title: USN-4048-1 -- Docker vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Aleksa Sarai discovered that Docker was vulnerable to a directory traversal attack. An attacker could use this vulnerability to read and write arbitrary files on the host filesystem as root.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4048-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-github-docker-docker-dev - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.4 docker.io - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.4 golang-docker-dev - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.4 vim-syntax-docker - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.4 docker-doc - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.4 No subscription required
